message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. I think you'll love it! I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. It's a steal at this price, and I'm confident you'll get a great value from it.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but $15000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to consider $10000 as a more reasonable price.

I understand that $15000 is a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $12500. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really benefit from this product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit concerned about the price. I'm willing to pay $11000 for the product.

I understand that $12500 is still a bit out of your budget, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $12000. This is my final offer, and I think it's a great deal for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $10500 for the product, which is the highest price I'm willing to go.
